body: High-shine lips are not for everyone. They are sticky, they are messy, they are impossible to eat with, and they leave snail-like smears on every glass. But who isn’t attracted to shiny things? There is something infinitely appealing about a shiny summer lip, as seen here at Givenchy, where they gothed it up in direct contravention of the fun and flowery seasonal make-up rules. Get the look MUA Power Pout Acrylic £3.50, superdrug.com YSL Beauty Gloss Volupte £22, yslbeauty.co.uk Clarins Lip Oil £19, houseoffraser.co.uk Laura Mercier Colour Dots £25, johnlewis.com Fresh Sugar Shine £15, fresh.com Chanel Rouge Coco Stylo £26, 020 7493 3836 Rosie for Autograph £12.50, marksandspencer.co.uk Dior Addict Milky Tint £26.50, dior.com Dr Hauschka Lip Gloss £15.75, drhauschka.co.uk  Email Eva at e.wiseman@observer.co.uk or follow her on Twitter @EvaWiseman
